message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60 and you take 40. It's important to reach an agreement quickly before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I'm willing to split it closer to the middle, but I'm not going to give you more than half. Let's make a deal before things get worse.
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting you more than me. I'll take 55, you take 45. This is a better deal than you'll get in later rounds.
Let's be reasonable here.  We're both losing money with each round.  We should split it evenly and stop this before we both lose everything.
